subject: How to create Progress Bar for JUnit?
msgSnippet: I write a siple program convert user s input to test case and invoke JUnit to run it. In Eclipse and Netbeans, you can see a progress bar when you run several
messageBody:
I write a siple program convert user's input to test case and invoke JUnit to run it. In Eclipse and Netbeans, you can see a progress bar when you run several test cases, so how to do a similar thing in my program?
Thanks!
